attributes.action: We Pakistani's declare India as a terrorist state. Please sign this petition.
attributes.additional_details: Indian are currently killing innocent Kashmiri people in the disputed land. Kashmiri people are & want to be part of Pakistan and are muslims. India are state sponsors of terrorist.
attributes.background: India killing innocent people in Kashmir.

rejection.details:
Terrorist State is not a designation used by the UK Government.

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to take a specific action to address your concerns about India

There is already an existing petition about this issue which you may wish to support https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/160509
